metadata.title: CVE-2022-23319 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A segmentation fault during PCF file parsing in pcf2bdf versions >=1.05allows an attacker to trigger a program crash via a specially crafted PCFfont file. This crash affects the availability of the software anddependent downstream components.

criterions.comment: pcf2bdf: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
